# notifications

Notifications settings.


**Type:** attribute set of (submodule)

**Default:** `{ }`

## notifications.enable

Whether to enable desktop notifications.

**Scope:** <Badge type="tip"><i class="fa-solid fa-globe"></i> Global</Badge>

**Type:** boolean

**Default:** `false`

## notifications.feature

Receive new features notifications.

**Scope:** <Badge type="tip"><i class="fa-solid fa-globe"></i> Global</Badge>

**Type:** boolean

**Default:** `true`

## notifications.help

Receive help notifications.

**Scope:** <Badge type="tip"><i class="fa-solid fa-globe"></i> Global</Badge>

**Type:** boolean

**Default:** `true`

## notifications.marketing

Receive marketing notifications.

::: warning

Disabling this option without a paid subscription will have no effect.

:::

**Scope:** <Badge type="tip"><i class="fa-solid fa-globe"></i> Global</Badge>

**Type:** boolean

**Default:** `true`

## notifications.position

Notification location within window.

**Scope:** <Badge type="tip"><i class="fa-solid fa-globe"></i> Global</Badge>

**Type:** constrained string

**Valid values:**
- `top-left`
- `top-right`
- `bottom-left`
- `bottom-right`

**Default:** `bottom-left`

## notifications.system

Receive system notifications.

**Scope:** <Badge type="tip"><i class="fa-solid fa-globe"></i> Global</Badge>

**Type:** boolean

**Default:** `true`
